com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.module.data_source

Class DataSourceModulesDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.module.data_source.DataSourceModulesDAO

  • public class DataSourceModulesDAO
extends java.lang.Object

    Data access object for data source modules. Used by DataSourceModuleResource servlet.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Calvin Goodrich

    • Method Detail

      • list

        public ListResult list(java.lang.String path,
              java.lang.String isSearch,
              int numRows,
              int pageNum,
              java.lang.String sortIndex,
              java.lang.String sortOrder,
              java.lang.String filters,
              java.lang.String searchField,
              java.lang.String searchString,
              java.lang.String searchOper,
              java.lang.String param)

        Sorts and filters the list of DataSource objects and returns a ListResult object containing the requested page of information.

        Parameters:
        isSearch - Indicates whether the request is a search request ("true" or "false".)
        numRows - Number of rows to return.
        pageNum - Page number to return (based on numRows.)
        sortIndex - Data element to sort on (as represented by a column in the UI.)
        sortOrder - Sort order ("asc" or "desc".)
        filters - Multi-row filtering (not currently used.)
        searchField - Search field to search on (isSearch = "true".)
        searchString - String to search for (isSearch = "true".)
        searchOper - Search operation (equals or "eq", not equals or "ne", etc.)
        param - Parameter name identifier to pass back when called to generate parameter value pick lists.
        Returns:
        The requested list of items.
        See Also:
        DataSourceModuleResource

      • findByPath

        public DataSourceModule findByPath(java.lang.String path)

        Searches for a data source module based on a URL encoded path and populates a DataSourceModule object.

        Parameters:
        path - The URL encoded ID to look for.
        Returns:
        The requested data source module as a DataSourceModule object.
        See Also:
        DataSourceModuleResource

      • serialize

        public void serialize(DataSourceModule dsm)
               throws java.lang.Exception

        Writes the data source module to disk as an XML file.

        Parameters:
        dsm - The URL encoded ID to look for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generate

        public ResultMessage generate(java.lang.String path,
                     java.lang.String profilePath,
                     java.lang.String serverId,
                     java.lang.String startPath)

        Contacts a CIS instance, generates requested data sources, and merges them with the specified data source module.

        Parameters:
        path - The URL encoded module to look for.
        profilePath - The path to the deployment profile.
        serverId - The ID of the server to generate from.
        startPath - The starting path to look for data sources.
        Returns:
        A ResultMessage with the result of the operation.

      • getDsTypesOrAttrs

        public DataSource getDsTypesOrAttrs(java.lang.String dsTypeName)

        Returns a DataSource object containing the list of default data source types or a specific data source type's attributes for the current default server. These types and attributes are updated when the user updates his/her default server on the preferences page.

        Parameters:
        dsTypeName - The data source type to look for. If null, then return the list of data source types.
        Returns:
        The data source types or attributes in a list contained in a DataSource object.
